text: jo striyaan yuvaavastha se guzarakar baith chukee hon, jinhen vivaah kee aasha na rah gaee ho, unapar koee dosh nahin ki ve apane kapade (chaadaren) utaarakar rakh den jabaki ve shrngaar ka pradarshan karanevaalee na hon. phir bhee ve isase bachen to unake lie adhik achchha hai. allaah bhalee-bhaanti sunata, jaanata hai
